description: Schema for deploying a Helm chart in a facets environment

kind.description: Kind of the intent, always set to 'helm'

flavor.description: Flavor for the Helm chart implementation, always set to 'default'

spec.description: Specification of the Helm chart intent

chart.description: URL or local path to the Helm chart package

namespace.description: Namespace to deploy the Helm chart in

wait.description: Whether to wait for the Helm chart deployment to complete

env.description: List of dynamic values to be passed to the chart, i.e to reference a variable/secret

items.description: List of dynamic values to be passed to the chart, equivalent to --set parameters in helm cli

name.description: Name of the property to be passed to the helm chart

attribute.description: Name of the secret (only applicable for 'secret' type)

default.description: Default value for the helm variable (only applicable for 'static' type)

values.description: The values to be passed on to the chart in the form of a json object

provided.description: Flag to tell if the resource should not be provisioned by facets

depends_on.description: Dependencies on other resources. e.g. application x may depend on y

name.description:
Name of the resource
    - if not specified, fallback is the `filename`
